name: Hot Corners
author: Richard Keller

sections.description:
Want a toolbar that stays out of the way? Hover to the corner of the page to get your admin links.
This plugin was made to enable users to get access to the admin area quickly without the default wordpress
toolbar. The four corners of the page are configurable via drag and drop settings page.

Please let me know if you have any issues with the plugin or you would like to see additions.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/hot-corners directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Hot Corners Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
0.1.1 – Added new post link option, tested with latest WordPress 4.9.5
0.1.0 – Added ability to activate corners by role.
